text.english:
Chapter 2: The Investigation Begins

You are summoned to the palace to investigate a mysterious case.
text.schinese:
第2章：调查开始

你被召入宫中调查一桩神秘案件。

text.schinese: 万历视角：这是第2章的第2个对话节点。调查继续进行。

End of Chapter 2

You have completed this chapter. The investigation continues...
